data.rationale:
Clutter is a GObject based library for creating fast, visually rich
    graphical user interfaces. It is intended for creating single window
    heavily stylised applications such as media box uiâs,
    presentations or kiosk style programs in preference to regular
    âdesktopâ style applications.

    It is intended to mask the developer from the low-level OpenGL API
    by using objects (actors) on a top-level canvas (stage), and using
    object oriented programming techniques instead of an imperative
    approach.
